summary: A left-wing terrorist group, consisting of several homosexual men and a female leader, kidnaps the son of a wealthy industrialist.
cast: Susanne Sachße|Daniel Bätscher|Andreas Stich|Dean Monroe|Anton Z. Risan|Daniel Fettig|Gerrit|Joeffrey|Ulrike Schirm|Keith Levy|Stephan Dilschneider|Pünktchen|Sven Reinhard|Genesis P-Orridge|Naushad|Huseyin Gunus|Alfredo Holz|Claus Matthes|Rafael Caba|Mischka Kral|Marco Volk|Darius Sautter Aschkanpour|Christoph Glaubacker|Andreas Stadler|Ralf Grawe|Mario Mentrup|David Arnold|Daniel Hendricksen
title: The Raspberry Reich
